titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that rates for inmate calling service should not exceed the affordable modified rates adopted by the Federal Communications Commission.
Expressing the sense of Congress that rates for inmate calling service should not exceed the affordable modified rates adopted by the Federal Communications Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) rates for inmate calling service should not exceed the affordable modified rates adopted by the Federal Communications Commission as of the date this resolution is adopted, and (2) reduced inmate calling service rates should be implemented as soon as possible.
